text.my_personal_apartment.reception.pay:
Welcome %1$s and hope you are doing well.
Before you can get your apartment, you need to pay the broker fee of %2$s x %3$s.

Let me know when you're ready to pay.
text.my_personal_apartment.reception.cla:
You are able to claim up to %2$s apartments.
Do you want to claim a apartment?
message.my_personal_apartment.no_apartme:
It looks like you don't have an apartment yet.
Talk to reception to get a new apartment to get started!
